title: Lleech

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You choose someone to kill each night.
- At the beginning of the game, you choose someone. You die when they die but you cannot die if they are alive.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the Cult of the Clocktower win the game.
